name: Labi 3D
description:
3D maze of translucent walls.

Objective: to move the ball from the blue corner to the red one.
You can pass several times, the shortest time is recorded.
The big arrows turn the maze. The circle in the center blocks gravity. The arrows at the bottom right change the opacity of the walls. Left buttons: exit and start over.

The game was made a long time ago for android, here is a link to googleplay https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DefaultCompany.Labi3D

ps The sound in html does not display correctly, it is better to turn off the music
